item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 15, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Lazarus Group laundered $200M from 25 crypto hacks to fiat (93 points | 34 comments)
2. OpenSCAD: The Programmer's Solid 3D CAD Modeller (190 points | 81 comments)
3. CSCI 181G PO: Game Engine Programming (37 points | 1 comment)
4. Writing a Lisp compiler (Lisp to assembly) from scratch in JavaScript (2018) (11 points | 1 comment)
5. Terence Tao on O1 (511 points | 305 comments)
6. One in five genetics papers contains errors thanks to Microsoft Excel (2016) (195 points | 95 comments)
7. The Bastard Operator from Hell (1999) (144 points | 47 comments)
8. Writing an OS in Rust (281 points | 33 comments)
9. Show HN: Meet.hn – Meet the Hacker News community in your city (589 points | 272 comments)
10. Making a rickroll laser: A parametric speaker (145 points | 37 comments)
11. A Time Consuming Pitfall for 32-Bit Applications on AArch64 (3 points | discuss)
12. Falsehoods programmers believe about TCP (209 points | 151 comments)
13. Show HN: Wordllama – Things you can do with the token embeddings of an LLM (3 points | discuss)
14. Why Scrum Is Stressing You Out (87 points | 74 comments)
15. Founder Mode, hackers, and being bored by tech (129 points | 29 comments)
16. Brsloan/warewoolf: A minimalist novel-writing system/rich text editor (32 points | 8 comments)
17. Show HN: I made a digital circuit drawing and simulation game (19 points | discuss)
18. Dynamic Viewpoint Symbols (10 points | discuss)
19. USPS' long-awaited new mail truck makes its debut (112 points | 84 comments)
20. To forget is an ethical act (81 points | 27 comments)
21. Nesting Arena Allocators in Rust (66 points | 3 comments)
22. We're not going to run out of new anatomy anytime soon (4 points | discuss)
23. Twelve Sentenced for Violent Home Invasion Robberies to Steal Cryptocurrency (86 points | 54 comments)
24. The Tippy Type makes typing with long nails less tedious (47 points | 34 comments)
25. Rollstack (YC W23) is hiring exceptional LLM engineers and Full-stack engineers ( | hide)
26. Free Starlink Internet is coming to all of United's airplanes (7 points | discuss)
27. Zen and the Art of Writer Decks (Using the Pomera DM250) (27 points | 7 comments)
28. The Rise of Open Source Time Series Databases (95 points | 38 comments)
29. Show HN: GitOps Template for Kubernetes (72 points | 33 comments)
30. LLMs Will Always Hallucinate, and We Need to Live with This (227 points | 197 comments)
